con:testCase.name: GoodCase-MiPayPPIT-Inactive
con:testCase.con:description: Aktuell ist es möglich, einen für DD bei PPIT registrierten Kunden im directDebitState INACTIV von MiPay für die LowBalanceThreshold Funktion registrieren zu lassen. Dies muss verhindert werden nach der Regel: Wenn bei einem registrierten DD Kunden (egal welcher Status) eine ContractId vorhanden ist, kann keine Registrierung für LowBalanceThreshold Seitens MiPay erfolgen. Mipay darf nur wieder dieses MSISDN registrieren, wenn PPIT komplett deregister aufgerufen hat.

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>The msisdn is already associated with other contract id</faultstring> <detail> <ns3:registerForThresholdEventFault xmlns:ns6="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/topupsynchronous/mipay/" xmlns:ns5="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/deregisterforthresholdevent/" xmlns:ns4="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/operationinfo/" xmlns:ns3="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/registerforthresholdevent/" xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/querystatusregisterforthesholdevent/"> <fault> <retryPossible>false</retryPossible> <originator>DRC</originator> <originatorMessage>The msisdn is already associated with other contract id</originatorMessage> <errorCode>1129</errorCode> <message>The msisdn is already associated with other contract id</message> </fault> </ns3:registerForThresholdEventFault> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>The msisdn is already associated with other contract id</faultstring> <detail> <ns3:registerForThresholdEventFault xmlns:ns6="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/topupsynchronous/mipay/" xmlns:ns5="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/deregisterforthresholdevent/" xmlns:ns4="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/operationinfo/" xmlns:ns3="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/registerforthresholdevent/" xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/querystatusregisterforthesholdevent/"> <fault> <retryPossible>false</retryPossible> <originator>DRC</originator> <originatorMessage>The msisdn is already associated with other contract id</originatorMessage> <errorCode>1129</errorCode> <message>The msisdn is already associated with other contract id</message> </fault> </ns3:registerForThresholdEventFault> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
